name: Unified Localisation of Mass over Oceans (ULMO)
author: En-Chi Lee
Christopher Harig
preview: A pipeline for using GRACE satellite gravimetry and altimetry-steric measurements to study ocean mass change over ocean basins, with extended functionalities for Slepian functions and sea level equation modelling.

name: Formosa
author: En-Chi Lee
preview: An personal Python/Fortran cartogrphy package to satisfy my love for mapping.

name: SurveySynth
author: Alexander Barker
Jason Bjornholm
Logan Kunze
En-Chi Lee
Parker London
preview: An experimental browser-based interactive work that transforms real-time audience-written text into ever-changing music and visuals.

name: Mr. Fish's Coral Friends
author: En-Chi Lee
preview: An interactive children's book incorporating fluid simulation to introduce the concept and main causes of sea-level rise.
